description: Leading development of microservices-based platforms handling millions of users. Architecting scalable solutions using Go, Vue.js, and AWS infrastructure.
Developed and maintained customer-facing web applications for B2B SaaS platform. Collaborated with product team to deliver features used by Fortune 500 companies.
Built backend services for data processing pipelines handling large-scale analytics workloads. Worked on ETL systems processing terabytes of data daily.
